credential_sets.label: Google Maps API Key
credential_sets.instructions: Create a Maps Platform API key, enable the Solar API for your Cloud project, and store the key in GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY. Append ?key=YOUR_KEY to Solar API requests.

credential_sets.label: Service Account JSON
credential_sets.instructions: Download a service account key with Solar API access and point GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS to the JSON file. Request OAuth tokens scoped to https://www.googleapis.com/auth/maps-platform.solar before calling the API.

credential_sets.label: User OAuth2 Token
credential_sets.instructions: Use the standard OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow to obtain a user access token with the Solar API scope, then set GOOGLE_OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN before running MCP tools.

notes: User must have a Google Cloud project with the Solar API enabled. Supply either GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY (query param), GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS (service account JSON), or GOOGLE_OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN (user token) plus the project ID in GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT.
